Name: The Forgotten Island - v1.0
About the game: This is a very small open world RPG game. Player needs to find various ways to interact in the game. Through battles, you can increase your level and talent points. Try to complete all the tasks to pass three level. Player can farm and fish. Can also eat and drink. Try to find your own way to enjoy the game. How to play : ◆ Press 'W', 'A', 'S', 'D' to walk around. ◆ Hold 'E' beside food and bed to recharge vitality. ◆ Hold 'E' beside well to recharge stamina. ◆ Press 'F' beside a NPC to fight. ◆ Upgrade your level and buy strong equipment. Fighting rules : (Like rock paper scissors) ◆ Attack include heavy attack and light attack. ◆ Attack can minus enemy's vitality but consume stamina. ◆ Defend can stop enemy's attack without stamina. ◆ Relax can restore stamina but with no defense. If you are attacked, your recovery will be ineffective. Heavy attack > Relax Light attack > Relax Defend > Attack Relax > Defend Talent system: ◆ 1 Strength → 120 Vitality and 50 Stamina. ◆ 1 Agility → 5 Attack and 2 Armor. ◆ 1 Intelligence → 20 Crit, 20 Avoid and 40 Lucky. P.S. (1) More missions are included in the Premium version. (2) Game walkthroughs are uploaded to YouTube and also our website. (3) The content has been updated to version 1.4 Best Regards, Thomas
